item.description:
This is an REI hosted event. "Hingham REI â€” Open Climbing on the REI Pinnacle". Free for REI member, and $10 for non-REI-member. See below for some detail

http://www.rei.com/ev...

Person I spoke with told me that this is designed for beginner, and they have all the equipment to rent (no additional cost), or in fact, required to use their equipment.

It's been a while since I did rock climbing. Good way to refresh basics for me in local setup. Anybody care to join?

Total group size that they can take says 30, but it is open to everyone. I heard that there are only 3 climbing area. So, to be honest, I think 12 people would be max.

Please sign up at the web-link above.

Masahiro

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Rock Climbing at Hingham REI (Beginner)
